basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Stanislav Temelkov. I am a student who seeks development and does everything to achieve his goals. I would say that I am slightly different from the others, but not in the negative. I have participated in the integration of blockchain (Cardano, Cronos, Ravencoin, etc.) to the American platform Cryptoslam. Creating online stores, maintenance, blogging, promoting and advertising web pages and social networks, and many other interesting projects. I have professional experience with Scrum-organized projects through JIRA, TRELLO and etc., AWS clusters, lambda, SQS, SNS, ECS, CloudFormation, EC2 and etc., .NET Framework, ASP.NET MVC, and Web API. I also have a cursory glance with Laravel and Angular. I will do my best to be pleased with myself and I'm sure it will happen. Although I am still a student, I like the profession I study for and want to work in it. I am a fan of remote work(such as there may be business trips or team building) as I think this model of work gives many opportunities for me and employers.

projects.title: School Website
projects.description: The most expanded application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many technologies and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles all adoption processess and allows to store all evidence on adopting animals from animal shelter.

projects.title: ITNEWSBG (WEBSITE)
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: RELAX IN VARNA
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
